name: The Root Problem #GGJ2023
description:
You're playing as E[i]n who's an imaginary number and wants to get real - So there's only one way to achieve that... exactly destroy all other real numbers >:D.

How to play?

Start the game and use [W], [A], [S], [D] for the movement - you can even dash! Be careful there's a cooldown on that (check the UI to see the CD). To destroy those evil numbers swipe and click with the mouse - as soon as you get it, it's oddly satisfying haha.

As soon as you reach the next level you receive a kader of power ups you can choose from! Choose wisely my friends!

What's the goal?

Survive. As. Long. As. Possible. - You'll receive a grade after you die! Let's see if you can get better than A ;)

How can you support?

Sharing is caring - Share this with your friends, leave a like, follow or even a comment :)

HAVE FUN && ENJOY
